Mark Udall Gabrielle Giffords ( D-AZ) is making progress in her recovery from the shooting in Tucson, though she is not yet able to speak: It's far too early for that. But she's making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. So she's really-- it's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury that she did. "People will say, "What happened? He only had 26 points, but he won the game," Sixers coach Larry David West said of Allen Iverson , who had reached 40 points in three straight games. He gave the ball up when he was double-teamed and did all the right things. I"m really proud of him. Jason Kidd had 22 points and 10 assists, Shawn Marion had 17 points and 13 rebounds and Rodney Rogers had 15 points and 10 rebounds for Phoenix, which had won four of five.
